data.project_subtitle: Sales Call Orchestration & Objection Flow App

executive_summary.problem: Sales calls currently rely on memory, experience, improvisation, and individual closer skill variance. This leads to inconsistency, arguing objections, emotional closes, poor qualification, and weak post-call data.
executive_summary.solution: A standardized, integrity-based sales call operating system that guides execution, records reality, and learns over time without relying on persuasion or improvisation.
executive_summary.target_market: High-ticket coaching business targeting financial advisors/brokers in Germany with 500+ existing clients
executive_summary.business_model: EUR 495 paid implementation calls that can lead to EUR 20k-28k coaching program

features.title: Call Flow Engine
features.description: Milestone-based call structure with enforced sequential progression. Each milestone contains objectives, required questions, confirmations, notes, and objection triggers.

user_stories.title: Navigate through call milestones
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want to follow a guided milestone-based call flow so that I maintain consistency across all sales calls.
acceptance_criteria: System displays current milestone with clear objective
Agent can check off required items within each milestone
Milestones are sequential and cannot be skipped in strict mode
Override option available in flexible mode with reason logging

user_stories.title: Toggle strict vs flexible mode
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to toggle between strict and flexible milestone enforcement so that the system adapts to different situations.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can set default mode per product/team
Flexible mode logs all milestone overrides with reason
Override events are auditable by managers

features.title: Seven Core Milestones
features.description: Pre-defined milestone structure for the implementation-to-coaching sales call: M1 Context & Frame (5 min), M2 Current State Mapping (15-20 min), M3 Outcome Vision, M4 System Reality Check, M5 Solution Mapping, M6 Offer Presentation, M7 Decision Point.

user_stories.title: M1 Context & Frame execution
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want to establish shared understanding of call scope so that the prospect understands this is a diagnostic, not a pitch.
acceptance_criteria: Fields: Reason for call (text), Confirmed expectation (checkbox)
Script guidance for stating 3 possible outcomes

user_stories.title: M2 Current State Mapping execution
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want to map the prospect's operational reality so that I expose fragility without judgment.
acceptance_criteria: Fields: Client count (number), Revenue volatility (1-5), Main pain (multi-select: Storno/chaos/instability)
Required coverage: client handling, revenue stability, operations, psychological load
System summary capability for agent to verbalize back

user_stories.title: M3 Outcome Vision execution
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want to capture the prospect's desired future state so that I understand what 'working' looks like for them.
acceptance_criteria: Fields: Desired outcome (text), Cost of inaction (text)
No hype or future fantasy language guidance

user_stories.title: M4 System Reality Check execution
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want to reveal the hidden cost of manual implementation so that the prospect understands the 'second job' effect.
acceptance_criteria: Confirmations: 'Understands implementation effort', 'Acknowledges manual workload risk'
Coverage: time required, management overhead, error probability, burnout risk

user_stories.title: M5 Solution Mapping execution
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want to present the LeadTunnel system so that the prospect sees leverage vs manual execution.
acceptance_criteria: One system vs tool chaos messaging

user_stories.title: M6 Offer Presentation execution
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want to present the coaching infrastructure investment so that pricing is framed structurally, not emotionally.
acceptance_criteria: Fields: Price shown (auto), Payment plan selected
Rule: Say price once, stop talking

user_stories.title: M7 Decision Point execution
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want to request an explicit decision so that every call ends with a clean outcome.

features.title: Objection System
features.description: Diagnostic objection handling system with 6 objection types. Each objection opens a subflow with clarifying questions (1-3 max) and mandatory outcome classification. Objections are signals to classify, not resistance to overcome.

user_stories.title: Trigger objection subflow
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want to trigger an objection subflow when a prospect raises a concern so that I can diagnose the signal without arguing.
acceptance_criteria: Objection selector appears at any milestone
6 objection types: Price, Timing, Capacity/Time, Need to think, Partner/Team, Skepticism
Each type loads specific diagnostic questions
No persuasion copy, only clarification prompts

user_stories.title: Complete objection with outcome
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want to classify the objection outcome so that the system tracks resolution status.
acceptance_criteria: Forced outcome selection: Resolved, Deferred, Disqualified
Unresolved objections persist into follow-up calls

user_stories.title: Price objection subflow
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want a structured diagnostic for price objections so that I identify value mismatch vs cashflow vs risk perception.
acceptance_criteria: Step 1: 'Compared to what?' (neutral, wait for answer)

user_stories.title: Timing objection subflow
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want a structured diagnostic for timing objections so that I understand real constraints vs avoidance.

user_stories.title: Capacity/Time objection subflow
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want a structured diagnostic for workload objections so that I understand burnout vs project resistance.
acceptance_criteria: Reframe question: manual overload vs new project resistance
Alignment check on work reduction belief

user_stories.title: Need to think objection subflow
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want a structured diagnostic for thinking objections so that I isolate the specific variable.
acceptance_criteria: Step 1: 'What specifically do you want to think through?'
Route to relevant subflow if variable identified

user_stories.title: Partner/Team objection subflow
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want a structured diagnostic for authority objections so that I understand decision dynamics.
acceptance_criteria: Step 1: Authority clarification (can make vs need permission)
Conditional close if aligned after conversation

user_stories.title: Skepticism objection subflow
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want a structured diagnostic for skepticism objections so that I understand past experience patterns.
acceptance_criteria: Proceed if distinction understood, disqualify if tactic-focused

features.title: Pre-Call Checklist
features.description: Mandatory preparation checklist that must be completed before joining the call, ensuring qualification review and readiness.

user_stories.title: Complete pre-call preparation
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want to verify prospect qualification before the call so that I don't pitch unqualified prospects.
acceptance_criteria: Checklist items: qualification form reviewed, client count confirmed (>=500), business type confirmed, revenue range noted, main pain identified, tool stack noted, ROI tool ready, time block clear
Hard gate: If 500 clients not confirmed, coaching pitch not allowed
All items must be checked before call can start

features.title: Qualification Gates
features.description: Hard qualification requirements that determine whether coaching pitch is allowed. Primary gate: minimum 500 existing clients.

user_stories.title: Enforce qualification gate
user_stories.description: As a sales system, I want to prevent coaching pitches to unqualified prospects so that we protect conversion quality.
acceptance_criteria: If not qualified: advisory call only, no selling

features.title: Call Outcome Classification
features.description: Forced end-of-call outcome selection with mandatory disqualification reasons when applicable.

user_stories.title: Classify call outcome
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want to classify the call outcome so that pipeline actions are triggered correctly.
acceptance_criteria: Forced outcome types: Coaching client, Follow-up scheduled, Implementation only, Disqualified
If disqualified: mandatory reason (<500 clients, Cashflow mismatch, Misaligned expectations, Capacity constraint, Authority issue)
Qualification flags: >=500 clients, Financial capacity, Strategic alignment
Cannot complete call without outcome selection

features.title: Follow-Up Call Support
features.description: Linked follow-up calls that resume context from previous calls, synced with GoHighLevel calendar.

user_stories.title: Schedule follow-up call
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want to schedule a follow-up call so that I can continue the conversation at the right time.
acceptance_criteria: Schedule Follow-Up button from any outcome
Syncs with GoHighLevel calendar for the lead

user_stories.title: Resume follow-up context
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want to see previous call context when starting a follow-up so that I pick up where we left off.
acceptance_criteria: Can resume at milestone or jump to decision

features.title: Dual Interface System
features.description: Separate Sales Rep Control Panel and Client Presentation View. The presentation opens in a new browser tab for Zoom tab sharing.

user_stories.title: Use sales rep control panel
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want a private control panel so that I manage the call without exposing mechanics to the client.

user_stories.title: Use client presentation view
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want a separate presentation tab so that I share only slides with the client via Zoom.
acceptance_criteria: Opens in new browser tab on 'Start Presentation Mode'
Synced live with rep actions via WebSocket

features.title: Canonical Slide Deck System
features.description: Versioned slide deck created once by admin and reused across calls. Only parameterized slots change per call, not the psychological flow.

user_stories.title: Create and version slide deck
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to create a canonical slide deck so that all calls follow the same psychological structure.
acceptance_criteria: One deck per product, versioned (v1, v2, v3)
Admin approval required for new versions

user_stories.title: Render personalized slides
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want slides to show prospect-specific data so that the presentation feels relevant.
acceptance_criteria: Parameter slots filled from call inputs (client count, pain points, etc.)

features.title: Slide Template vs Instance Model
features.description: Separate system-level templates from call-level instances for learning and analysis.

user_stories.title: Track slide instances
user_stories.description: As a system, I want to record each slide presentation so that I can analyze effectiveness over time.
acceptance_criteria: SlideInstance linked to: client ID, call ID, agent ID

features.title: Call Recording (Fathom-Style)
features.description: Recording system that joins Zoom silently when link is pasted, capturing audio, transcript, and timeline markers.

user_stories.title: Record call via Zoom link
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want the system to record my call so that I have a transcript for analysis.
acceptance_criteria: Timeline markers for milestones, objections, slide changes
Recording linked to call session and slide instances

features.title: AI Post-Call Analysis
features.description: AI-powered call analysis that runs after the call ends, generating summaries, classifications, and recommendations. AI does not influence live decisions.

user_stories.title: Generate call analysis
user_stories.description: As a manager, I want AI to analyze completed calls so that I understand patterns and performance.
acceptance_criteria: All outputs traceable to call evidence

user_stories.title: Generate follow-up email
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want AI to draft a follow-up email so that I save time on post-call tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Email based on call facts only
No persuasion, urgency, or new offers

features.title: Role-Based Access Control
features.description: Multi-tier access system with Sales Agent, Manager, and Admin roles, each with specific permissions.

user_stories.title: Manage user roles
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to assign roles to users so that they have appropriate access levels.
acceptance_criteria: Sales Agent: create/run calls, notes, objections
Manager: review calls, analytics, AI output, ROI tool link
Admin: configure flows, milestones, objections, prompts

features.title: Manager Dashboard
features.description: Analytics dashboard for managers to review call performance, patterns, and agent metrics.

user_stories.title: Review call analytics
user_stories.description: As a manager, I want to see call metrics so that I can optimize the sales process.
acceptance_criteria: ROI tool integration for projected vs actual comparison

features.title: Admin Configuration Panel
features.description: Admin interface for configuring milestones, slides, objections, prompts, and system settings.

user_stories.title: Configure system components
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to edit all system components so that the business controls the sales logic.

features.title: AI Prompt Registry
features.description: Admin-configurable prompt system with 5 layers: Global, Milestone, Objection, Slide Analysis, Call Synthesis. All prompts are variable-driven, not hard-coded.

user_stories.title: Manage AI prompts
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to edit AI prompts so that AI behavior is governable without code changes.
acceptance_criteria: Prompt scopes: global, milestone, objection, slide, analysis

features.title: Bilingual Support
features.description: Full German and English language support at content level for white-label readiness.

user_stories.title: Use bilingual content
user_stories.description: As a sales agent, I want to run calls in German or English so that I serve the appropriate market.
acceptance_criteria: All milestones, objections, prompts stored with DE/EN variants

features.title: Guardrails System
features.description: Anti-arguing controls that prevent persuasion, rebuttals, discounts, and emotional manipulation.

user_stories.title: Enforce guardrails
user_stories.description: As a system, I want to prevent sales manipulation so that the brand maintains integrity.
acceptance_criteria: No rebuttal sections in objection flows
No discount fields or price editing
AI refuses to generate sales scripts, handle objections live, or bypass qualification

features.title: Learning & Iteration Loop
features.description: System that learns from every call and converges toward best-known deck/flow versions without killing adaptability.

user_stories.title: Track effectiveness scores
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to see slide and milestone effectiveness so that I can iterate deliberately.
acceptance_criteria: Slide effectiveness scoring (close-rate correlation, objection frequency)

features.title: White-Label Readiness
features.description: Architecture designed for future white-label deployment with tenant-based config, custom branding, and multi-product support.

user_stories.title: Support white-label deployment
user_stories.description: As a business, I want the system to be white-label ready so that I can license it to other coaching businesses.

security.data_encryption: TLS 1.3 in transit, AES-256 at rest
security.recording_storage: Secure cloud storage with access logging
security.audit_trail: Full audit log for all administrative changes

entities.name: User
entities.description: Sales agent, manager, or admin user

entities.name: SlideDeck
entities.description: Versioned slide deck for a product

non_goals: No live AI co-pilot during calls
No best response suggestions during calls

success_metrics.target: < 15% variance in milestone completion time across agents
> 95% of closed deals meet 500+ client threshold

success_metrics.measurement: Retention rate correlated with qualification flags

success_metrics.target: < 2 weeks to first solo call for new closers
success_metrics.measurement: Time from onboarding to independent call execution
Percentage of objections with outcome classification

assumptions: Sales agents have stable internet for Zoom calls
Prospects are pre-qualified through EUR 495 payment gate
Financial advisors/brokers understand German business context
GoHighLevel is the primary CRM for lead management
Recording consent is obtained before call starts
constraints: AI must not influence live call decisions
Slides cannot be regenerated per call (only parameters change)
Qualification gate of 500+ clients is non-negotiable
No discounting or price negotiation features
German and English only in Phase 1

dependencies.name: GoHighLevel API
dependencies.description: Required for CRM sync and calendar integration

dependencies.name: LLM API (Claude/GPT)
dependencies.description: Required for AI post-call analysis and summarization

design_preferences.preset_rationale: Enterprise B2B SaaS platform for coaching business - requires professional, trustworthy appearance that conveys reliability and structure. The sales process itself is about systematic thinking and infrastructure, not hype.
style_notes: Aviation checklist aesthetic for the control panel
Presentation slides should be neutral and analytical, not marketing-oriented
No persuasion language in any UI copy
design_preferences.target_audience: Sales closers, founders, and implementation consultants in the German financial advisory coaching space
accessibility_requirements: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance for control panel
